name: penguin town
description:
An adventure game about a penguin repairing a lighthouse.

Talk to different people, avoid crabs and walk along the beach in this town. The town's lighthouse has broken, and you need to fix it!

Interact with the locals to get knowledge and gain the resources you need to get to the lighthouse to fix it.

This game was made in only a few weeks and I wanted to finish a game by the end of 2020, so here penguin town was made!

Controls:

  • W to walk forward towards the mouse
  • Use the mouse to point towards where you want to walk
  • E to interact with objects/people
  • Escape to exit game
  • Press SPACE to pick up the surfboard when you are over it

I hope you enjoy the game, donations are appreciated but not required.
